author: Pablo Lopez

review: I was skeptical because of the size and price, but gave it a shot anyway based on reviews. We've had it for about six months and It works great. We use are Android tablet to stream Netflix, Hulu and Pandora. The video/audio quality is great and it is super easy to use. I haven't tried YouTube or Chrome, but for watching and listening to streamed content from the big providers it is perfect.
author: D. Ridgely "SpecialD"

review: It was great everything was perfect

review: It could only pick up YouTube. I was unable to watch movies saved to my phone.
